entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -24.9°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 9.7 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
